attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Born 1928 Lincolnshire,resident UK till 1990,ex RAF national service. Retired resident in France since. 
OAP, robbed of proportion of Equitable Life pension by your poor supervision, made worse by the 5 billion £ a year dividend tax, no fuel allowance,never had anything except promise of free passport for life from you. AT LEAST DO SOMETHING ABOUT EQUITABLE LIFE COMPENSATION BEFORE I DIE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
